backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, user profile types, initializes authorization and storage mixins, maps for entities, and seeds default Swiss salons if empty.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text describing summaries of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base variables and theming setup with light/dark modes and OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Small wrapper that imports and renders AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React component implementing full V66 demo UI with artists, categories, preset services, and interactive MirrorProtocol flow.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Placeholder component file with no content.
Empty placeholder file for a salon creation form component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the member loyalty card UI.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder file for a monopoly mode toggle UI.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a tactile motion button component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a premium salon badge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a pressable tactile wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for a user profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder file for a multiâ€‘step salon creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder file for the Pro Studio creation UI.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a revenue chart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder file for a salon list display component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a VIP dashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with automatic access control initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder for query-related React hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty file placeholder for salon image utilities or hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom animation keyframes and classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering App into the root element.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty placeholder for the client dashboard page component.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the login page component.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the professional dashboard page component.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the salon details page component.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style aura descriptions for salons based on category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty placeholder for currency utility functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, reset instructions, architectural notes, and known issues for the ongoing rebuild.
